testcase.title: Verify the filters in GRC - Dual User

steps.title: I logged in as a "RIDualUser" user with access to "Rampart" project
I perform Quick Search by "fees"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Global Regulatory Comparisons report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Global Regulatory Comparisons" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is + displayed with4 reports

steps.title: Verify result page is displayed at least one record
I apply filter "Fees" from "Section" filter set under "Global Regulatory Comparisons" dataset
the results table header should contain the filter applied "Fees"

substeps.message: Filter Counts and Results Count are Matching

steps.title: I verify if filter count is matching the results count

substeps.message: [Header of results] Displayed applied filters: null

steps.title: there should not be applied filters after the user clicks link 'Clear' in filters group "Section"
I click 'Show all filters' filter link for "Product Category" filter menu on the Search Results page
the tab "Product Category" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page

substeps.message: All filter options are  sorted on frequency

steps.title: I check if all filter options are sorted on frequency in 'Show All Filters' pop up

substeps.message: One filterDrugs and Biologics (4) was applied

steps.title: I apply option 1 on pop-up 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 4 and header count is 4

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count
I click 'Show all filters' filter link for "Country/Region" filter menu on the Search Results page
the tab "Country/Region" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page

substeps.message: All filter options are  sorted on frequency

steps.title: I check if all filter options are sorted on frequency in 'Show All Filters' pop up
I apply option 1 on pop-up 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 4 and header count is 4

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count

testcase.title: Verify the filters in GRC - DB and MD User

steps.title: I logged in as a "RIDrugsUser" user with access to "Rampart" project
I perform Quick Search by "not cancer"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Global Regulatory Comparisons report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Global Regulatory Comparisons" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is + displayed with33 reports

steps.title: Verify result page is displayed at least one record
I apply filter "Last 12 months" from "Last Update Date" filter set under "Global Regulatory Comparisons" dataset
the results table header should contain the filter applied "Last 12 months"

substeps.message: Filter Counts and Results Count are Matching

steps.title: I verify if filter count is matching the results count

substeps.message: [Header of results] Displayed applied filters: null

steps.title: there should not be applied filters after the user clicks link 'Clear' in filters group "Last Update Date"
I click 'Show all filters' filter link for "Section" filter menu on the Search Results page
the tab "Section" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page

substeps.message: All filter options are  sorted on frequency

steps.title: I check if all filter options are sorted on frequency in 'Show All Filters' pop up

substeps.message: One filterLegal Definitions and Marketing Requirements (6) was applied

steps.title: I apply option 1 on pop-up 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 6 and header count is 6

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count
I click 'Show all filters' filter link for "Country/Region" filter menu on the Search Results page
the tab "Country/Region" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page

substeps.message: All filter options are  sorted on frequency

steps.title: I check if all filter options are sorted on frequency in 'Show All Filters' pop up
I apply option 1 on pop-up 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 5 and header count is 5

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count
